meanings.definition: ラテン語の "quod vide" の略
meanings.english_definition: Abbreviation of the Latin phrase "quod vide," meaning "which see." It is used in writing to direct the reader to another location in the current work or in another work for further information on the topic being discussed.

examples.sentence: See also Smith (2005), q.v. for further discussion.
examples.translation: 詳細な議論については、Smith (2005)も参照のこと。

usage_notes.explanation: "q.v." is used to direct the reader to another entry or source for more information on the topic at hand. It is often used in academic or scholarly writing.

readability_explanation.text: "QV" is an abbreviation of the Latin phrase "quod vide," meaning "which see." It is used in academic or scholarly writing to refer the reader to another entry or source for more information. It is not commonly used in everyday writing or speech.

example_sentences.sentence: For a different perspective, see Jones (1998), q.v.
example_sentences.translation: 異なる視点については、Jones (1998)を参照のこと。
